Headline: No trains between Kimball and Southport
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between  Kimball and Southport due to a stalled train at Kimball.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Southport due to a stalled train at Kimball.

As a result, trains are operating only between the Loop and Southport at this time.

  • Shuttle buses are requested to provide connecting service between Kimball and Belmont, in both directions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
